column4: If security is the primary concern would it be safer to use "apt-get upgrade" or "apt-get dist-upgrade." It is my understanding "upgrade" will update to the extent it can without changing dependencies. However, would this mean that it's potentially vulnerable to threats that would be patched with a "dist-upgrade" ?
security doesn't affect upgrade vs dist-upgrade
it is more "complete" yes, but both pull from the same repository - the security is the same for all Ubuntu packages
feel free to PM me if you'd like my opinion on security
